com.example.hivefrontend.Hive.Logic

Class HiveLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hivefrontend.Hive.Logic.HiveLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHiveVolleyListener

    public class HiveLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHiveVolleyListener
    HiveLogic handles the logic behind the Hive class and handles the server responses.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HiveLogic(IHiveView hv, IHiveServerRequest hsr)
      The HiveLogic constructor takes interfaces IHiveView and IHiveServerRequest and assigns them to local variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HiveLogic

        public HiveLogic(IHiveView hv,
                 IHiveServerRequest hsr)
        The HiveLogic constructor takes interfaces IHiveView and IHiveServerRequest and assigns them to local variables. Then, it adds this volley listener to the server.
        Parameters:
        hv - interface IHiveView to be used by this HiveLogic
        hsr - interface IHiveServerRequest to be used by this HiveLogic
